author: Jill Dupleix
method: Scatter the sugar over the top of the yoghurt in a large shallow bowl, cover and chill for 3 hours or more, until the sugar melts into a caramel syrup.  Stir well and serve with warm muffins, poached fruits, pies and tarts.
